Key Match Events: The Dodgers came back to win the series against the Padres and clinch the division
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers badly need a few days off to get ready for October due to injuries in the lineup and questions in the rotation
Post-Match Reflections: The extra days to get healthy will also be welcomed by the Dodgers' lineup, which lost first baseman Freddie Freeman to a sprained ankle in Thursday's series finale
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have the opportunity this weekend to secure the top seed in the National League and the best record in MLB, which would lock up home-field advantage through the entire postseason
Others: The Dodgers will be without Glasnow, Stone or Clayton Kershaw, who, while still attempting to return from bone spurs in his foot, is not healing as quickly as he or the team hoped
